chapterCard.title: Introduction to Programming
chapterCard.subTitle: Learn the basics of programming and start coding!

chapterIntro.title: Welcome to the Introduction to Programming
chapterIntro.description: This chapter will introduce you to the fundamental concepts of programming. You will learn about different programming languages, how to write simple programs, and understand basic programming constructs.

chapterOutro.title: Chapter Completed!
chapterOutro.description: Congratulations on completing the Introduction to Programming chapter. You have taken the first step in your programming journey.

sneakPeaks.text: In the next chapter, we will explore data structures and algorithms.

conclusion.text: Well done! Keep up the great work and continue learning.
